<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disengaging Twist](/Feats.aspx?ID=6447) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 222 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Wrestler](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=270)

**Prerequisites**
[Wrestler Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6446)

**Trigger**
A creature gives you the [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77) or [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90) condition.

</column>

---

Your ability to twist your opponents’ bodies into painful locks and holds makes you particularly adept at escaping such predicaments. Attempt an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) check to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) the triggering condition. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to this check.
name: Disengaging Twist
